lines.text:
[Asking his friend Muir to act as his grandson's tutor]
The West is coming to the East. The Little Wu must be taught to hold his own.
Nang Ping, you know the law by which we live is the law by which we die.

[In a racially condescending fashion]
You Chinese eat the silliest food!

[to the Little Wu]
Your wife was born last week.

[to Mrs. Gregory]
Ere the sun sets, it is for one or the other to pay the debt. It is for you to decide.

[to Nang Ping]
Love is beautiful, my darling, and very sweet. Have no fear.
